short_description: A leading pharmaceutical company implemented an AI-driven predictive maintenance system in their manufacturing process, resulting in a 30% reduction in downtime and a significant increase in production efficiency.
feedback: This success story meets all the required criteria. However, it would be beneficial to include specific metrics on production output and cost savings to enhance the impact of the success story.

short_description: A global pharmaceutical firm utilized AI algorithms to optimize their drug manufacturing process, leading to a 25% increase in yield and a reduction in waste by 15%.
feedback: This success story fulfills all the necessary criteria. To improve the output of the research process, consider adding details about the specific AI technologies used and any challenges faced during implementation, as this would provide a more comprehensive view of the project.
